original_text: When they deliver you over, do not be anxious how you are to speak or what you are to say, for what you are to say will be given to you in that hour.
korean_text: 너희를 넘겨 줄 때에 어떻게 또는 무엇을 말할까 염려하지 말라 그 때에 너희에게 할 말을 주시리니

sentences.original_text: do not be anxious how you are to speak or what you are to say
sentences.korean_translation: 어떻게 말할지나 무엇을 말할지 걱정하지 말라

sentences.original_text: for what you are to say will be given to you in that hour
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 말할 것은 그 시간에 주어질 것이니
